sentences.english: The second stage of labor should be shortened.
sentences.chinese: 产时适当缩短第二产程。

sentences.english: The term "quickening" refers to the rising pulse rate during the second stage of labor.
sentences.chinese: 术语“胎动”定义为分娩的第二产程期间加快的脉搏。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between abnormal fetal heart and the neonatal prognosis during the second birth process.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨第二产程胎心监护异常与新生儿预后的关系。

sentences.english: There was no depression of uterine activity during infusion period and second stage of labor.
sentences.chinese: 此后在连续输注及第二产程中无宫缩抑制现象。

sentences.english: The amniotic sac breaks and is expelled in the third stage of labor.
sentences.chinese: 在第三产程，羊膜囊破裂并被排出。

sentences.english: Fetal weight should be estimated prior to labor in all postdates pregnancies.
sentences.chinese: 在产程开始之前估计胎儿体重。

sentences.english: If labor has not begun within a reasonable time after rupture of membranes induction with oxytocin ( Pitocin ) is appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 若破膜后产程未在适当时间开始，可给予缩宫素引产。

sentences.english: This so called breech presentation may prolong the process of delivery and can be somewhat risky to the baby.
sentences.chinese: 臀先露可能会延长产程和对胎儿有些许危险。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the phloroglucinol role in the birth process.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察间苯三酚在产程进展中作用。

sentences.english: Progress during the second stage of labor is measured by fetal descent and rotation.
sentences.chinese: 第二产程的进展通过胎儿下降和旋转来判断。

sentences.english: Effects of doula delivery on intrapartum and postpartum;
sentences.chinese: 探讨导乐陪伴式分娩在产程中的疗效。

sentences.english: F. At term, about 8% of patients will present with ruptured membranes prior to the onset of labor.
sentences.chinese: 足月后约8%患者在产程开始前出现胎膜破裂。

sentences.english: Objective To study the causes and preventive measures of abnormal second stage of labor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨引起第二产程异常的原因及防治措施。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a non-invasive method for measuring and evaluating cardiac reserve during pregnancy and stages of labor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索孕期和产程心脏储备无创性检测和评估方法。

definition: to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
to face childbirth/about to give birth/refers esp. to the onset of regular contractions
